long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Lingpad AI - Translate Chrome extension allows Lingpad users to instantly localize any content they visit through the browser to 120+ global languages. It gives you human-accurate, contextual translation using the nuanced AI algorithms.
Our Chrome extension is a user-friendly tool for translation without leaving the source content or copy-paste the same. Being the only tool with contextual translation, you get high-quality, relevant, and secure translation across the web.
Use cases of Lingpad AI - Translate Chrome extension:
1. Solve customer queries and issues instantly using Lingpad
2. Translate the non-native source content to your preferred language
3. Provide native language customer support via browser-based communication channels
4. Send translated content to others who speak a different language than yours
5. Get contextual translation with your existing Lingpad TM and glossaries
